Post.title: MySQLoffsetSql
Post._content:
# 

```sql
SELECT
*
FROM table
where condition1 = 0
and condition2 = 0
and condition3 = -1
and condition4 = -1
order by id asc
LIMIT 2000 OFFSET 50000
```
offsetoffset

MySQL`offset``offset+N``offset``N``offset`

# 

```sql
SELECT
*
FROM table
JOIN
(select id from table
where condition1 = 0
and condition2 = 0
and condition3 = -1
and condition4 = -1
order by id asc
LIMIT 2000 OFFSET 50000)
as tmp using(id)
```



```sql
SELECT a.* FROM table a, 
(select id from table
where condition1 = 0
and condition2 = 0
and condition3 = -1
and condition4 = -1
order by id asc
LIMIT 2000 OFFSET 50000) b 
where a.id = b.id
```


offset

## 

Docker/linux/amd64linux/arm64linux/riscv64tagtag

MySQLDocker HubDocker

![1.png](https://imgs.doodl6.com/docker/build-multi-platform-image/1.png)

linux/amd64linux/arm64`docker pull mysql:8.0`dockermanifest



---

## 



### 

dockercontainerd-snapshotter

#### containerd-snapshotter

/etc/docker/daemon.json
```text
"features": {
  "containerd-snapshotter": true
}
```
![2.png](https://imgs.doodl6.com/docker/build-multi-platform-image/2.png)

docker

**OrbStack**

**OrbStackDocker**

**Docker Desktop[https://docs.docker.com/desktop/containerd/](https://docs.docker.com/desktop/containerd/)**

<!--more-->

#### 

```shell
docker buildx inspect --bootstrap
```
![3.png](https://imgs.doodl6.com/docker/build-multi-platform-image/3.png)

Platforms

#### 



```shell
docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64,linux/arm64 -t martindai/wechat-robot:1.0 --load .
```
**`--load``--push`**


```shell
docker images
```
![4.png](https://imgs.doodl6.com/docker/build-multi-platform-image/4.png)



#### 
```shell
docker push martindai/wechat-robot:1.0
```
![5.png](https://imgs.doodl6.com/docker/build-multi-platform-image/5.png)



### 

manifest

```shell
docker manifest inspect martindai/wechat-robot:1.0
```
![6.png](https://imgs.doodl6.com/docker/build-multi-platform-image/6.png)

docker







#### **containerd-snapshotter**

#### 

tag

```shell
docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64 -t martindai/wechat-robot:1.1-amd64 .
docker buildx build --platform linux/arm64 -t martindai/wechat-robot:1.1-arm64 .
```



```shell
docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64 -t martindai/wechat-robot-amd64:1.1 .
docker buildx build --platform linux/arm64 -t martindai/wechat-robot-arm64:1.1 .
```

**PStag**

#### 



```shell
docker push martindai/wechat-robot:1.1-amd64
docker push martindai/wechat-robot:1.1-arm64
```
![7.png](https://imgs.doodl6.com/docker/build-multi-platform-image/7.png)

#### manifest

```shell
docker manifest create martindai/wechat-robot:1.1 martindai/wechat-robot:1.1-amd64 martindai/wechat-robot:1.1-arm64 --amend
```

#### manifest

```shell
docker manifest inspect martindai/wechat-robot:1.1
```
![8.png](https://imgs.doodl6.com/docker/build-multi-platform-image/8.png)

manifestmanifest

manifest

```shell
docker manifest annotate --arch arm64 martindai/wechat-robot:1.1 martindai/wechat-robot-arm64:1.1
```
`martindai/wechat-robot:1.1`manifest`arm64``martindai/wechat-robot-arm64:1.1`

manifest

```shell
docker manifest rm martindai/wechat-robot:1.1
```

#### manifest

menifest

```shell
docker manifest push martindai/wechat-robot:1.1
```
![9.png](https://imgs.doodl6.com/docker/build-multi-platform-image/9.png)



---

/

Post._content:
##  ##
`Docker`githubzookeeperrediselasticsearchdocker

:[https://github.com/MartinDai/SpringBoot-Project][1]

----------

#  Docker Desktop

 [https://www.docker.com/get-started][2]

# docker 

## docker

`docker --version`

dockerdocker

![1](https://imgs.doodl6.com/docker/docker-learn-note/1.png)

## 

`docker --help`

docker

![2](https://imgs.doodl6.com/docker/docker-learn-note/2.png)

,`docker images --help`docker`--help`

![3](https://imgs.doodl6.com/docker/docker-learn-note/3.png)

<!--more-->

## 

`docker pull [OPTIONS] NAME[:TAG|@DIGEST]`

[hub][3]hubgithubRedis

![4](https://imgs.doodl6.com/docker/docker-learn-note/4.png)

`docker pull redis`redis

![5](https://imgs.doodl6.com/docker/docker-learn-note/5.png)

`docker pull redis:5.0.5`5.0.5

hubelasticsearchkibana,docker.elastic.co,`docker pull docker.elastic.co/elasticsearch/elasticsearch:6.2.4`

dockerdeamon.json
```
{ "registry-mirrors": ["https://docker.mirrors.ustc.edu.cn/","https://hub-mirror.c.163.com","https://registry.docker-cn.com"], "insecure-registries": ["10.0.0.12:5000"] }
```

## 

`docker images`



![6](https://imgs.doodl6.com/docker/docker-learn-note/6.png)

## 

`docker rmi [OPTIONS] IMAGE [IMAGE...]`

`docker rmi my-image:1.0``my-image``1.0`

## 

`docker run [OPTIONS] IMAGE [COMMAND] [ARG...]`

redis`docker run --name my-redis -p 6379:6379 -d redis``--name``docker run``my-redis``-p 6379:6379`63796379`-d`

## 

`docker container ls [OPTIONS]`

`docker container ls``docker container ls -a`

## 

`docker container rm [OPTIONS] CONTAINER [CONTAINER...]`

`docker container rm my-container1 my-container2`
name`my-container1``my-container2`

## 

`docker start [OPTIONS] CONTAINER [CONTAINER...]`

`docker start my-container1`name`my-container1`

## 

`docker exec [OPTIONS] CONTAINER COMMAND [ARG...]`

`docker exec -it my-redis /bin/bash`

## 

`docker cp [OPTIONS] SRC_PATH|- CONTAINER:DEST_PATH`

`docker cp /Users/martin/Downloads/test.txt e4cf118af140:/var/lib/dev/`


`/Users/martin/Downloads/test.txt`
`e4cf118af140`ID
`/var/lib/dev/`

## 

`docker cp [OPTIONS] CONTAINER:SRC_PATH DEST_PATH|-`

`docker cp e4cf118af140:/var/lib/dev/test.txt /Users/martin/Downloads/`


`/Users/martin/Downloads/`
`e4cf118af140`ID
`/var/lib/dev/test.txt`

## 

`docker stop [OPTIONS] CONTAINER [CONTAINER...]`

redis`docker stop my-redis`

## 

`docker commit [-m] [-a] CONTAINERID REPOSITORY[:TAG]`

`-m` comment
`-a` 
`CONTAINERID` ID
`REPOSITORY[:TAG]` tag

ID

`docker commit -m "add something" -a "Martin Dai" e4cf118af140 my-image:latest`

## 

`docker push REPOSITORY[:TAG]`

`docker push my-image:latest`

## 

`docker export [OPTIONS] CONTAINER`

`docker export -o my-image.tar my-container`name`my-container``my-image.tar`

## 

`docker import [OPTIONS] file|URL|- [REPOSITORY[:TAG]]`

`docker import my-image.tar my-image:latest``my-image.tar``my-image``latest`


# docker-compose 

`docker-compose`yml

yml(yml[][4])docker-compose.yml

```yml
version: '3.7' #docker-compose
services: #
  redis: #
    image: redis:5.0 #
    container_name: redis #
    command: redis-server /etc/redis/redis.conf #
    restart: always #
    volumes: #
          - ./redis/:/etc/redis/ #redis/etc/redis
    ports: #
      - 6379:6379 #63796379
    networks: #
      - net-cache
  memcached:
    image: memcached:1.5
    container_name: memcached
    restart: always
    ports:
      - 11211:11211
    networks:
      - net-cache
networks:
  net-cache:
    driver: bridge #
```
`docker-compose up`redismemcached`-f``docker-compose -f docker-compose-cache.yml up``-d`

`docker-compose up``docker-compose down`



[1]: https://github.com/MartinDai/SpringBoot-Project
[2]: https://www.docker.com/get-started
[3]: https://hub.docker.com/
[4]: https://docs.docker.com/compose/gettingstarted/

2Gcode_cachemetaspace

<!--more-->

### NMT

> NMTNative Memory TrackingJava7U40HotSpotjcmdJVMJavaNMT5%10%

```
-XX:NativeMemoryTracking=[off | summary | detail]  
# off:  
# summary: .
# detail: Collect memory usage by individual call sites.
```

`-XX:NativeMemoryTracking=detail`

topRES5G

`jcmd <pid> VM.native_memory summary scale=MB`

![2](https://imgs.doodl6.com/problem/record-once-no-heap-oom/2.png)

committed2G3G

### pmap

> pmapLinux

`pmap -x <pid> | sort -n -k3 > pmap-sorted.txt`

`pmap-sorted.txt`64M

![3](https://imgs.doodl6.com/problem/record-once-no-heap-oom/3.png)

linux glibc  64M [ Java  OOM glibc ](https://club.perfma.com/article/1709425?last=1714757&type=parent)

MALLOC_ARENA_MAX=1`pmap`

### smaps + gdb

gdbdump

gdbdumpsmaps

```
cat /proc/<pid>/smaps > smaps.txt
```

smaps.txt 7fb9b0000000-7fb9b3ffe000

![4](https://imgs.doodl6.com/problem/record-once-no-heap-oom/4.png)

gdb

```
gdb attach <pid>
```

dumpsmaps0x

``` 
dump memory /tmp/0x7fb9b0000000-0x7fb9b3ffe000.dump 0x7fb9b0000000 0x7fb9b3ffe000
```

10

```
strings -10 /tmp/0x7fb9b0000000-0x7fb9b3ffe000.dump
```

Post.title: Jetty 9  jetty.sh  Unix
Post._content:
Jetty`bin/jetty.sh`UnixOS Xjetty

UnixJetty

## **Jetty**

Jetty

```shell
[/opt/jetty]# tar -zxf /home/user/downloads/jetty-distribution-9.3.1-SNAPSHOT.tar.gz 
[/opt/jetty]# cd jetty-distribution-9.3.1-SNAPSHOT/
[/opt/jetty/jetty-distribution-9.3.1-SNAPSHOT]# ls
bin        lib                         modules      resources  start.jar
demo-base  license-eplv10-aslv20.html  notice.html  start.d    VERSION.txt
etc        logs                        README.TXT   start.ini  webapps

[/opt/jetty/jetty-distribution-9.3.1-SNAPSHOT]# cp bin/jetty.sh /etc/init.d/jetty
[/opt/jetty/jetty-distribution-9.3.1-SNAPSHOT]# echo JETTY_HOME=`pwd` > /etc/default/jetty
[/opt/jetty/jetty-distribution-9.3.1-SNAPSHOT]# cat /etc/default/jetty
JETTY_HOME=/opt/jetty/jetty-distribution-9.3.1-SNAPSHOT

[/opt/jetty/jetty-distribution-9.3.1-SNAPSHOT]# service jetty start
Starting Jetty: OK Wed Nov 20 10:26:53 MST 2013
```

`/opt/jetty/jetty-distribution-9.3.1-SNAPSHOT`JettyUnix

rootJetty

## **Jetty**

Unix()

LinuxUbuntu 12.04.3 LTS

### ****

```shell
# mkdir -p /opt/jetty
# mkdir -p /opt/web/mybase
# mkdir -p /opt/jetty/temp
```



- `/opt/jetty` Jetty
- `/opt/web/mybase` web
- `/opt/jetty/temp` java`java.io.tmpdir`

`/tmp`servletJetty

<!--more-->

### **Java 7**

Jetty`${project.version}`Java 7Java

```shell
# apt-get install openjdk-7-jdk
```

[Java7](http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/index.html)

```shell
# java -version
java version "1.6.0_27"
OpenJDK Runtime Environment (IcedTea6 1.12.6) (6b27-1.12.6-1ubuntu0.12.04.2)
OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM (build 20.0-b12, mixed mode)

# update-alternatives --list java
/usr/lib/jvm/java-6-openjdk-amd64/jre/bin/java
/usr/lib/jvm/java-7-openjdk-amd64/jre/bin/java

# update-alternatives --config java
There are 2 choices for the alternative java (providing /usr/bin/java).

  Selection    Path                                            Priority   Status
------------------------------------------------------------
* 0            /usr/lib/jvm/java-6-openjdk-amd64/jre/bin/java   1061      auto mode
  1            /usr/lib/jvm/java-6-openjdk-amd64/jre/bin/java   1061      manual mode
  2            /usr/lib/jvm/java-7-openjdk-amd64/jre/bin/java   1051      manual mode

Press enter to keep the current choice[*], or type selection number: 2
update-alternatives: using /usr/lib/jvm/java-7-openjdk-amd64/jre/bin/java to provide /usr/bin/java (java) in manual mode.

# java -version
java version "1.7.0_25"
OpenJDK Runtime Environment (IcedTea 2.3.10) (7u25-2.3.10-1ubuntu0.12.04.2)
OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM (build 23.7-b01, mixed mode)
```

### **Jetty**

JettyJetty

```shell
# useradd --user-group --shell /bin/false --home-dir /opt/jetty/temp jetty
```

`jetty``jetty`shell`/bin/false``/opt/jetty/temp`

### ****

[Official Eclipse Download Site](http://www.eclipse.org/jetty/documentation/current/quick-start-getting-started.html#jetty-downloading)



```shell
[/opt/jetty]# tar -zxf /home/user/Downloads/jetty-distribution-9.3.1-SNAPSHOT.tar.gz 
[/opt/jetty]# ls -F
jetty-distribution-9.3.1-SNAPSHOT/
[/opt/jetty]# mkdir /opt/jetty/temp
```

JettyJetty9.1`${jetty.home}``${jetty.base}`web

`/opt/jetty/temp`JettyUnix`/tmp`Servlet`/opt/jetty/temp`

### **web**

`/opt/web/mybase``${jetty.base}`

*****JettyJetty`${jetty.base}`Jetty

```shell
# cd /opt/web/mybase/
[/opt/web/mybase]# ls
[/opt/web/mybase]# java -jar /opt/jetty/jetty-distribution-9.3.1-SNAPSHOT/start.jar \
   --add-to-start=deploy,http,logging
WARNING: deploy          initialised in ${jetty.base}/start.ini (appended)
WARNING: deploy          enabled in     ${jetty.base}/start.ini
WARNING: server          initialised in ${jetty.base}/start.ini (appended)
WARNING: server          enabled in     ${jetty.base}/start.ini
WARNING: http            initialised in ${jetty.base}/start.ini (appended)
WARNING: http            enabled in     ${jetty.base}/start.ini
WARNING: server          enabled in     ${jetty.base}/start.ini
WARNING: logging         initialised in ${jetty.base}/start.ini (appended)
WARNING: logging         enabled in     ${jetty.base}/start.ini
[/opt/web/mybase]# ls -F
start.ini  webapps/
```

`/opt/web/mybase`

**deploy**	`/opt/web/mybase/webapps`webwarJetty IoC XML

**http**,HTTP`start.ini`

**logging**Jetty`/opt/web/mybase/logs/`

[Using start.jar ](http://www.eclipse.org/jetty/documentation/current/start-jar.html)`${jetty.base}`

war

```shell
# cp /home/user/projects/mywebsite.war /opt/web/mybase/webapps/
```

Jetty80808080
`/opt/web/mybase/start.ini``jetty.http.port`

```shell
# grep jetty.http.port /opt/web/mybase/start.ini
jetty.port=80
```

### ****

Jettyweb

```shell
# chown --recursive jetty /opt/jetty
# chown --recursive jetty /opt/web/mybase
```

### ****

JettyUnix

```shell
# cp /opt/jetty/jetty-distribution-9.3.1-SNAPSHOT/bin/jetty.sh /etc/init.d/jetty
# echo "JETTY_HOME=/opt/jetty/jetty-distribution-9.3.1-SNAPSHOT" > /etc/default/jetty
# echo "JETTY_BASE=/opt/web/mybase" >> /etc/default/jetty
# echo "TMPDIR=/opt/jetty/temp" >> /etc/default/jetty
```



```shell
# service jetty status
Checking arguments to Jetty: 
START_INI      =  /opt/web/mybase/start.ini
JETTY_HOME     =  /opt/jetty/jetty-distribution-9.3.1-SNAPSHOT
JETTY_BASE     =  /opt/web/mybase
JETTY_CONF     =  /opt/jetty/jetty-distribution-9.3.1-SNAPSHOT/etc/jetty.conf
JETTY_PID      =  /var/run/jetty.pid
JETTY_START    =  /opt/jetty/jetty-distribution-9.3.1-SNAPSHOT/start.jar
JETTY_LOGS     =  /opt/web/mybase/logs
CLASSPATH      =  
JAVA           =  /usr/bin/java
JAVA_OPTIONS   =  -Djetty.state=/opt/web/mybase/jetty.state 
       -Djetty.logs=/opt/web/mybase/logs
       -Djetty.home=/opt/jetty/jetty-distribution-9.3.1-SNAPSHOT 
       -Djetty.base=/opt/web/mybase 
       -Djava.io.tmpdir=/opt/jetty/temp
JETTY_ARGS     =  jetty-logging.xml jetty-started.xml
RUN_CMD        =  /usr/bin/java 
       -Djetty.state=/opt/web/mybase/jetty.state 
       -Djetty.logs=/opt/web/mybase/logs 
       -Djetty.home=/opt/jetty/jetty-distribution-9.3.1-SNAPSHOT 
       -Djetty.base=/opt/web/mybase 
       -Djava.io.tmpdir=/opt/jetty/temp
       -jar /opt/jetty/jetty-distribution-9.3.1-SNAPSHOT/start.jar 
       jetty-logging.xml 
       jetty-started.xml
```

